title: Is BTS the best Korean music group of all time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes it’s safe to say that I mean their legends SERIOUSLY at this point & keep making history!! Like they’ve literally PAVED THE WAY🤷🏽‍♀️ Things like this that BTS have been doing and achieving haven’t been achieved since the Beatles and they were from the 80s-90s I think(I’m not a Beatles fan lolll & I wasn’t born during that time, I just know I think all the members ended dying :/)
Well, BTS is the most well known music group. PSY is also very famous for his hit, gangam style! So yes BTS is the ‘best’ korean music group of all time because PSY is only one man
